posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bill Cornell
*** 1/14/08 - ALL CARDS ARE SOLD *** 

I've got 9 T204's (8 different, including Pelty PSA 2) and 4 T222's for sale at what I think are reasonable prices.  All cards but one are graded, ranging from PR to EX. Large scans, descriptions and prices are available on my website here: [url]http://www.t207.com/sale.shtml[/url]. Also open to trades - a link to my wantlist is on the sale page.

All prices have been reduced since I posted here last week.  10% off purchases of 2 or more cards.

Thanks for looking & Happy New Year.

Bill


T204:  Ewing (PSA 4) $300, Hoblitzell (PSA 3) $215, Howard (SGC 40) $250, Howell (PSA 4) $350), Karger (PSA 5) $500, Lobert (PSA 4) $275, Pelty (PSA 2) $400, Smith (SGC 40) $250, Smith (SGC 40 - different card) $250

T222:  Perdue (SGC 40) $250, Burns (SGC 30) $150, Zimmerman (SGC Auth) sold, Phelan (raw) $95
